Effect.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 face-up Dinosaur monster you control or in your hand, except "Jewel Beast - Argosaurus", then add 1 Reptile, Sea Serpent, or Winged Beast monster with the same original Level as the destroyed monster, or 1 "Evolution Pill" Spell, from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Jewel Beast - Argosaurus" once per turn.
